posts.post_content:
Have made some great buys recently. Would like to keep on adding Hall of Famers, Southern Leaguers, Tough Commons, and Harder backs to my collection.  

Really looking to trade, but buying works too.

[quote name="wazoo" post=1034383]I haven't bought a card for over a month now and have had no luck with anyone yet. Please keep the PMs coming, thank you. I hope to work a deal soon enough.[/QUOTE]

What condition and any preference of players? I see a ton of T206 activity in the BST area. I have a few just back from SGC, mostly a bit higher grade...and Piedmont backs.

Hard to believe you haven't had any luck.  With the amount of cards listed almost daily, there is about something for every collector's taste on here. 

Best,

Andy
Most of them are out of my price range.

Wazoo,

Check out my T206 Lots post on the BST.

Thanks.

Steve

[quote name="wazoo" post=1034435]Most of them are out of my price range.[/QUOTE]

Whats your price range?
Right now, 1-350. I'm trying to work a deal for a Hindu Southern Leaguer.

pm sent.

all the best,
barry
Made a great Hindu trade with Erick. Still looking to add. Please let me know.
Got some great cards recently! Just a quick bump.
